name: Space Escape (MarcyMcSupial)
description:
Space Escape is a 3D action FPS about escaping captivity to ensure your species survival while fighting off the enemies that want to conduct further tests on you.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to jump
  • SHIFT to sprint
  • MOUSE to look around
  • LEFT MOUSe BUTTON to shoot
  • RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to aim

Features

  • Fast-paced action
  • Difficult combat
  • Scarce resources to manage and find
  • Teleportation devises to try and get an advantage in combat
  • Slow time pick-up ability
